flawed_nl_solution:
The kingfisher caught 13 + 7 = <<13+7=20>>20 fish.
The pelican and kingfisher caught 13 + 20 = <<13+20=35>>35 fish
The fisherman caught 3 x 35 = <<3*35=105>>105 fish
The fisherman caught 105 - 13 = <<105-13=92>>92 more fish than the pelican.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 33, not 35. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
